author: elecharny
msg: o Added a new test for simple Bind requests in server-unit, covering all the cases for a Simple Bind request
o Added an UnAuthent level for the case where a user try to authenticate with a DN but no password
o Returns an UnwillingToPerform message for this case
o Fixed the same test in core-integ test

author: veithen
msg: Disable failing SOAP 1.2 tests in MailTransportListenerTest.

Applied patch from Abel Muiño that fixes this problem.
